version_description: Application updates and improvements
Under the hood changes
Fixes issues with AnimeLab not loading for some users.
Fixed crash on long lists.

Fixes crash when finishing an episode.
Fixed a login crash.

Improved Google Cast support
Fixed issues with loading long lists
Fixed crash caused when selecting to complete an episode.
Bug fixes on listing episodes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes and improvements.

We're excited to present the new version of AnimeLab!
- A whole new and fresh layout.
- Discover more Anime with the new home screen.
- iPhone X Support!
- Improved Chromecast support.

We're excited to present the new version of AnimeLab!
- A whole new and fresh layout.
- Discover more Anime with the new home screen.
- iPhone X Support!
- Improved Chromecast support.
- Bug and stability improvements
- Fixes issue where video quality is not persisting across videos.

We're excited to present the new version of AnimeLab!
- A whole new and fresh layout.
- Discover more Anime with the new home screen.
- iPhone X Support!
- Improved Chromecast support.
- Bug and stability improvements
- Fixes issue where video quality is not persisting across videos.
- Fixes issue where choosing an incorrect video quality for free users.
- Fixes issue where free users were not able to play videos if they had "Prefer Dubbed" selected

Offline Playback is now available to Premium Subscribers! (iOS 12+)
Some new UI updates.
Stability improvements.

Fixed issue with Haptic Touch previews from resetting the show scroll position.
Fixed some minor issues with Haptic Touch previews display.

*** Note that iOS 9 support will end this year ***
Users on iOS 12.2+ should see a reduction in application size.
Fixed bug where new pages of genres couldn't be loaded.
Improved animation and application flow.
Fixed issue with shows and episodes not fully opening.
Some improvements to iOS 9 devices.
Other fixes and performance improvements
Stability improvements.

Skip forwards and backwards in the video player.

Fixed an issue in relation to deep-links.
Changed some sign up flow text.
Changed some sign up flow text.

*New Feature* Skip credits with a push of a button. Not all episodes have this feature but going forward we're working on improving skip support!
Changed the skip forwards and backwards icon. to make it more clear.

Fixed a crash when visiting lists of shows

• Sign in with Facebook has been removed from the app. If you previously used Facebook to sign in, please request a password reset with the email associated with your Facebook account. You can do this in-app by selecting "I've forgotten my password!" at the log in screen.
• Various fixes for crashes with offline playback and certain navigation flows.
• Fixed the video player crashing when encountering certain errors
Minor bugfixes and performance improvements.
